results.title: Coronavirus: Horse racing in Great Britain suspended until end of April
results.summary: All horse racing in Great Britain will be suspended from Wednesday until the end of April because of the coronavirus outbreak.

results.title: Coronavirus: Norwich Alan Partridge festival rescheduled
results.summary: The organiser of an Alan Partridge fan festival has decided not to take a chance with people's health - and postponed the event.

results.title: Euro 2020 postponed until 2021 amid coronavirus pandemic -- Norwegian FA
results.summary: UEFA has decided to postpone this year's European Championship until 2021 because of the ongoing coronavirus outbreak, according to the Norwegian FA.

results.title: UK tells citizens to avoid non-essential travel for 30 days
results.summary: British nationals are being advised against any non-essential travel globally for 30 days because of the coronavirus pandemic, British Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab told the House of Commons Tuesday.

results.title: German foreign minister rules out exclusive access to coronavirus vaccine, without mentioning Trump
results.summary: Germany’s foreign minister Heiko Maas told reporters that “others” would not be allowed to buy German coronavirus research exclusively, without naming US President Donald Trump.

results.title: Seattle will offer $800 grocery store vouchers to 6,000 families
results.summary: Seattle Mayor Jenny Durkan announced that the city will provide more than 6,000 families $800 in vouchers for any Safeway store in the state, according to a statement from the mayor’s office.

results.title: Spain coronavirus deaths approach 500
results.summary: Coronavirus cases in Spain have risen to 11,178 with 491 deaths, a health ministry official said Tuesday.

results.title: IKEA to shut all stores in Germany
results.summary: Furniture dealer Ikea will close all 53 of its stores in Germany from Tuesday in order to protect employees and inhibit the spread of coronavirus, the company confirmed in a statement sent to CNN.

results.title: Iran confirms largest jump in virus cases over 24-hour period
results.summary: Iran has confirmed 1,178 new cases of coronavirus, the biggest increase the country has seen over a 24-hour period.

results.title: France goes into lockdown after Macron promises to protect businesses
results.summary: France officially entered lockdown at midday Tuesday local time (7 a.m. ET) as part of a number of measures announced by President Emmanuel Macron.
